description: This file sets up a knowledge base using a PDF URL, connects to a Cassandra database, creates a keyspace, and initializes an agent with a language model and knowledge base, then queries it.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads PDF content from URLs and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with a language model and a knowledge base to process queries.

classes.name: MistralChat
classes.description: A class representing a chat-based language model.

classes.name: Cassandra
classes.description: A class representing a Cassandra vector database integration.

classes.name: MistralEmbedder
classes.description: A class for embedding text using the Mistral model.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the response from the agent to a given query, with options for markdown and full reasoning.
